title: Project out of school: planning a quality service
creator_credit: Alex Jaye, Maryla Juchnowski, Suzanne Cecil-Fizdale and Video Media Production
brief_description: Provides the considerations for planning quality out of school programs both before and after school. Shows a number of active programs, emphasises the advantages of holding such programs, and illustrates ways of involving parents, children and staff. Appropriate for Professional Development and Personal Development (Home Economics) at VCE level
